# Breadcrumb Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Classic

**Appearance Class:** `app-breadcrumb classic`

---

## Appearance: Attribute-based

**Appearance Class:** `app-breadcrumb attribute-based`

---

## Appearance: Path-based

**Appearance Class:** `app-breadcrumb path-based`
